product_name: Big Agnes Copper Spur UL 2 mtnGLO Tent
long_description: Experience illuminated comfort and convenience in the wilderness with the built-in mtnGLOTM LED lighting and 2-door / 2-vestibule design of this ultralight 2-person, 3-season backpacking tent.
short_description: Experience illuminated comfort and convenience in the wilderness with the built-in mtnGLOTM LED lighting and 2-door / 2-vestibule design of this ultralight 2-person, 3-season backpacking tent.
